title: Reindeer Are Real
description: Reindeer are amazing animals! Reindeer Are Real shares interesting facts about reindeer using descriptive text and photographs. High-frequency words are detailed photographs support emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to ask and answer questions as they read and to determine the author's purpose for writing the book.
meta: born, real, reindeer, sleds, travel, weigh
Author's Purpose : Determine the author's purpose
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /r/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency words all, are, and walk

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
